scripts.Serve:dev:functions: firebase use dev && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.Serve:prod:functions: firebase use prod && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.Deploy:dev:functions: node scripts/beforeFunctions.js dev && firebase deploy --only functions && node scripts/afterDeploy.js dev-functions
scripts.Deploy:dev:hosting: node scripts/beforeFunctions.js dev && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting && node scripts/afterDeploy.js dev-hosting
scripts.Deploy:dev: node scripts/beforeFunctions.js dev && npm run build && firebase deploy && node scripts/afterDeploy.js dev-all
scripts.Deploy:prod:functions: //node scripts/beforeFunctions.js prod && firebase deploy --only functions && node scripts/afterDeploy.js prod-functions
scripts.Deploy:prod:hosting: //node scripts/beforeFunctions.js prod && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting && node scripts/afterDeploy.js prod-hosting
scripts.Deploy:prod: //node scripts/beforeFunctions.js prod && npm run build && firebase deploy && node scripts/afterDeploy.js prod-all
